questions.question_text: Which of the following computing devices would be used to provide a centralized means to distribute services to a group of clients and usually possesses a role on a LAN?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. It will only work on 32 bit, it will crap out/not work on 64bit

Selected Answer: A
x86 can install on 32 and 64 bit, but it might only work on 32 bit, 64 bit won't run on x86 chip
x86 which is 32-bit, can be installed on both 32-bit and 64-bit. Answer is B

Selected Answer: A
You should be able to install the app on a 64-bit but may not run correctly

The original version of x86 created in 1978 was designed for 16-bit CPUs. This
means that each instruction is 16-bits "wide." The first 32-bit CPU was
introduced in 1985 and the x86 instruction set was updated to a 32-bit version,
called x86-32 or IA-32 (Intel Architecture).

Selected Answer: B
B. x86 supports an installation on a 32-bit and a 64-bit CPU architecture.

Selected Answer: A
x86 is for 32 bit only. It is sometimes also referred to as x86- 32 . x86- 64 supports 64 bit. They often referred by the term x64

choices.C: x86 only supports an installation on a 64-bit CPU architecture.
choices.A: x86 only supports an installation on a 32-bit CPU architecture.
choices.D: x86 supports an installation on a 16-bit CPU architecture.
choices.B: x86 supports an installation on a 32-bit and a 64-bit CPU architecture.

comments.content:
PII may be used alone or in tandem with other relevant data to identify an individual and may incorporate direct identifiers, such as passport information, that can identify a person uniquely or quasi-identifiers, such as race, that can be combined with other quasi-identifiers, like "date of birth", to successfully recognize an individual.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is an example of information a company would ask employees to handle in a sensitive manner?

The sales department needs to keep a customer list that contains names, contact information, and sales records. This list will need to be edited by multiple people at the same time. Which of the following applications should be used to create this list?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Database software

Explanation:
Database software is designed to manage large amounts of data efficiently and allows multiple users to access, edit, and update data simultaneously. It can handle structured data such as customer names, contact information, and sales records. Examples include Microsoft Access, MySQL, Oracle, or SQL Server.
